Reviews.Content: finished reading earlier review hotel completely agree comments wrote swung cat cat wife suitcases absolutely specific comments double bed hot window wind caused window rattle stuff paper window quiet soap shower soap dispenser sitting toilet uncomfortable knee waqs pressing shower towels seen days breakfast joke orange juice served shot glass liitle gone food cooked somehow found container baked beans orange juice glass ones brekfast started cleaning tables eating smell detergent mixed smell food unpleasant nearest car park 510 minutes walk pleasures paid £125 checking poor quality poor value money central london

Reviews.Content: larger suitcase trouble suffer claustrophobia stay sat loo hard pressed radiator receptionist pleasant experience dire breakfast time 0730 1000 0830 breakfast cooked 0730 simply kept luke warm wouldnt extra rasher bacon replace sausage leave plate pot beans couldnt 20 beans pathetic shot glass orange juice poor value money

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable!”

Reviews.Content: stayed night business booking short notice wimbledon fortnight bad idea note postcode taxi driver lost twice trying incredibly desk fan provided ventilation unfortunately arrived bathroom appointed shower hot cold breakfast ok particularly special personally little expensive suppose thats booking late eh visit similar situation otherwise try elsewhere

Reviews.Content: positive location negatives five uncomfortable nights beds worn collapsed pillows shower base filled due bad drainage reception attendant rude uncooperative previously complaints complaint

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Palmier
Reviews.Content: recommend staying hotel customer service excellent staying hotel doing london marathon reception offered breakfast earlier normal leave hotel previously stayed bigger hotel offer service decent size nights stay comment kettle tea coffee hotel location restaurants short walk plenty variety choose 510 min walk victoria station

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay, we will stay in this hotel again !”
Reviews.Author: ctisserand
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel sister friends 4 people glad chosen hotel situated close victoria station lovely quiet street staff pleasant stay clean fresh towels day cleaned beds day theres safe fridge breakfast english continental chose light option contained orange juice cereal toasted bread marmelade tea coffee staff kindly accepted luggage check day dont hesitate werent money write review caroline fiona

Reviews.Title: “Very small rooms--may work for you”
Reviews.Author: Scooter_014
Reviews.Content: stayed december 2010 nights negatives average size hotel london hotels extremely bathroom door bed tripped suitcase enteringexiting limited floorspace building squeaky floors awakened morning 7 am staff preparing breakfast refridgerator cold smelled musty positives questions quickly efficiently handled friendly staff breakfast excellent cooked location pleasant 10 minute walk tube stop didnt spend time hotel exploring london looking store bags sleep house noticed hotels larger roomsi stay house

Reviews.Title: “Most mildew I have ever seen; teeny tiny rooms and very noisy.”

Reviews.Content: tiniest seen european standards am usually picky actually suitcase floor walk time floors creaky super thin transmit step cough flush toilets etc earplugs dont plan getting rest bathroom shower stall mildew mold seen life photos front desk fair friend bathroom clean moldy drain drain properly standing water tried clean breakfast traditional english breakfast option cereal toast etc food delicious included price service front desk employees nice friendly helpful moved complained bad tried location 67 min walk pimlico tube station access street located pretty classy price charged 89 pounds night 140 tiny exaggerating barely suitcase floor quality ridiculously awful london standards suppose sounds cheap experience extreme mold shower noisy water pump outside door kept 2 nights promised night didnt forgot third night moved upstairs mildew grout drain drain showering standing water gross heat middle night forced bed downstairs pump hot water radiator pump noisy provides heat filth trouble complaining mold photos offer discount free night wish include wifi price instead charging 10 pounds night turnoff features breakfast location front desk staff lack sleep busy vacation dirtiness size ruin trip front desk staff tried accommodate appreciate efforts unfortunate
